query:
SELECT ss.id, ss.companyId, ss.customDomain, ss.domainVerified, c.name as companyName, c.email, c.slug
FROM site_settings ss 
JOIN companies c ON ss.companyId = c.id 
WHERE ss.customDomain LIKE '%bruno%';
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3Fmyq5DhyXRREKB.root --database 2BVimoerGJ5AEbhy4VpTbU --execute SELECT ss.id, ss.companyId, ss.customDomain, ss.domainVerified, c.name as companyName, c.email, c.slug
FROM site_settings ss 
JOIN companies c ON ss.companyId = c.id 
WHERE ss.customDomain LIKE '%bruno%';
